alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 4:07AM CDT until March 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY MIX OF FREEZING RAIN, SLEET AND SNOW EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 2 and 5 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Oneida, Vilas, Florence, Forest and Northern Marinette County Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Oneida; Vilas
